concept.title: AFICC PGI 5333.103 Protests to the Agency

conbody.p: (f) Contracting officers are encouraged to work with interested parties to resolve issues amicably in lieu of a protest. However, when an Agency Protest occurs and the contracting officer determines it to be invalid or unsupportable, contracting officers may use the Agency Protest Summary Dismissal Template .
(1) Pre-award. Following legal review of the protest, should a decision to award be made, the COCO should review and make the final decision to award.
(3) Post-award. Following legal review of a protest, the COCO should review and decide whether or not to continue performance.
